definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: When a public security organ demands the arrest of an offender, it shall obtain the approval of a people's procuratorate.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關要求逮捕人犯的時候，由人民檢察院批准。

sentences.english: The public security organ shall carry out examination in the course of transportation of precursor chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關應當在易製毒化學品的運輸過程中進行檢查。

sentences.english: The public security organ or the people's procuratorate shall inform the prison of the result of its handling.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關或者人民檢察院應當將處理結果通知監獄。

sentences.english: Tangmou said that when she found that when the law on public security organs to the police.
sentences.chinese: 唐某稱，當她發現違法時，就向公安機關報警了。

sentences.english: False then the passengers and the public security organ for handling by the airport.
sentences.chinese: 隨後將該旅客和假證交由機場公安機關處理。

sentences.english: Wreck rolling stock engine driver Chen Mou have already been controled by the local communal security institution.
sentences.chinese: 失事車輛司機陳某已被當地公安機關控制。

sentences.english: And the Political Security Bureau is the ancestor of the Public Security Bureau .
sentences.chinese: 國家政治保衛局則是公安機關的前身。

sentences.english: The police scoured the country for the fugitive.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關在全國搜索逃亡者。

sentences.english: If the exposure is true to the fact, the traffic administrative department of the public security organ shall grant awards.
sentences.chinese: 舉報屬實的，公安機關交通管理部門應當給予獎勵。

sentences.english: The public security organ shall take the auction trade as a special trade and exercise public security administration on it.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關對拍賣業按照特種行業實施治安管理。

sentences.english: Article 71 When making an arrest, a public security organ must produce an arrest warrant.
sentences.chinese: 第七十一條公安機關逮捕人的時候，必須出示逮捕證。

sentences.english: Public security departments shall exercise security control over the auctioning industry as special industry.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關對拍賣業按照特種行業實施治安管理。

sentences.english: Internet security Administration (abbr. ISA) is a newly emerging assignment for the Police.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網安全管理是公安機關的一項新型警務活動。

sentences.english: The public security department has solved three major cases this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月，公安機關告破三起要案。

sentences.english: 'They will be dealt with by the police -- I won't interfere.'
sentences.chinese: 他們會由公安機關處理，這件事我絕不參與。

sentences.english: Procuratorates also supervised the public security organs in investigation of 5 IPR infringement crimes.
sentences.chinese: 監督公安機關立案偵查侵犯知識產權犯罪案件5件。

definition: to investigate and handle (a criminal case)

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Xing2 jing3 Zu3 zhi1
